name: module12challenge
description: Full stack portfolio application. This is the root dir of my project and is where all the base structure will lie for my portfolio application. Running scripts here will build both the frontend and backend of the app.

scripts.start: npm run start:client & npm run start:server
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server

author: kjudall
